about_the_game:
Moonhaven combines farming, survival, tower defense, and role-playing genres.

You awake on the beach of a seemingly deserted and definitely haunted island. Hungry and alone, armed with only your wits, you set out to survive and build a life for yourself. Can you make it through the night and fend off the monsters bent on destroying what you worked hard to build? It will not be easy. The once vibrant, nearby town of Moonhaven lies in ruins and now is home only to monsters and the ghosts of the past! With some dedication, you may just be the one to vanquish the monsters and restore the island to its former glory!

Turn the wilderness on the island into a bustling farm! Grow crops, raise animals and craft new items! Build your dream farm anywhere you want in the island's wilderness.

Defend your farm! During full moons, fend off hordes of monsters bent on destroying what you worked so hard to build!

Survive the cold nights! Grow, gather, hunt and fish for the food you need to survive!

Up to 5 Players! Invite 1-4 players to join you on the island online! Players can work together to build their farms, share resources and rebuild the nearby town of Moonhaven!

Level up your skills! Everything you do gains you experience and levels. Each level you get a new skill point you can spend on unlocking new cooking and crafting recipes, and improving your farming, crafting, hunting, fishing and fighting abilities.

Explore a mysterious island! You'll encounter a variety of animals and monsters. Find powerful weapons, raw materials for crafting and mysteries to be uncovered.

Cook delicious foods and craft everything you need! Cook dozens of different recipes to help sustain you and provide you with beneficial effects. Craft tools, weapons, building materials and other useful items to help you build your farm and survive on the island!

Build your base! Build your own farm house, barn and more! Build fences and traps to keep out predators during the night and protect your crops.
